name: introspectively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that examines and considers your own ideas, thoughts, and feelings, rather than talking to other people about them: His charcoal drawings suggest a man introspectively involved in his work. She wrote introspectively about her life experiences. See
introspective
More examplesFewer examplesYou need to look introspectively at your life and try to figure things out in a way that works best for you. He did not question too introspectively what exactly had happened.The song starts out softly and introspectively.
